Name: Luminiferous Ether
Classical_Explanation: Medium for electromagnetic waves to propagate through space
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Light propagates via field equations - no medium needed. Michelson-Morley null result

Name: Caloric Fluid
Classical_Explanation: Invisible fluid flowing between objects causing temperature changes
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Heat = molecular kinetic energy. Temperature = average kinetic energy of particles

Name: Phlogiston
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Combustion = oxidation reaction. Oxygen consumed not phlogiston released

Name: Dark Matter (Mass)
Classical_Explanation: 85% of universe mass is invisible non-baryonic matter
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Discrete bounded gravity sum ≠ continuous integral. Nitai correction eliminates missing mass

Name: Dark Energy (Λ)
Classical_Explanation: 73% of universe is repulsive vacuum energy accelerating expansion
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Redshift = S_observable boundary artifact not expansion. No acceleration → no dark energy needed

Name: Cosmological Constant (original)
Classical_Explanation: Einstein's Λ term to prevent gravitational collapse
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Λ=0 works with discrete corrections. Universe infinite not static finite

Name: Cosmic Inflation
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No horizon problem in infinite universe. S_observable boundary explains homogeneity
Evidence: Infinite Universe - no Big Bang → no inflation needed

Name: Big Bang Singularity
Classical_Explanation: Creation event at t=0 from infinite density
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Big Bounce: a(t) ≥ a_min = 10.0. No singularity via quantum gravity repulsion

Name: Universal Expansion
Classical_Explanation: Space itself stretching causing wavelength increase
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Redshift = S_observable boundary discretization. Observers confined to poly(n) reach

Name: Wave Function Collapse
Classical_Explanation: Discontinuous random jump from superposition to eigenstate
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Bounded projection within S_observable. Inverse Nittay: continuous → discrete sampling

Name: Quantum Randomness (א^א)
Classical_Explanation: True bit-level randomness - no hidden variables possible
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Physics-level bounded noise (15-92% compressible). Hidden variable = √c (S_observable structure)

Name: Many Worlds
Classical_Explanation: Universe splits into 2^n branches at each measurement
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Only S_observable states physical. Exponential branches unreachable - single world
Evidence: Discrete Hilbert Space - poly(n) not exp(n) states

Name: Quantum Entanglement Non-locality
Classical_Explanation: Instantaneous action at distance violating causality
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Correlations pre-exist in S_observable. No information transfer. Bell bounds bounded

Name: Black Hole Singularity
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Dark Stars: massive opaque finite. No singularity - bounded curvature R_μν ≤ R_max. Like closing light in a big room - you can't see inside but the room is still there. Conservation laws (energy information baryon angular momentum) all forbid infinite density

Name: Event Horizon Information Loss
Classical_Explanation: Information destroyed at event horizon violating unitarity
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Event horizon = S_observable boundary not causal boundary. Information preserved (15-92% compressible). Observational limit not physical limit - dark room analogy

Name: Heat Death of Universe
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Entropy = information distribution not randomness. Bounded → never reaches א^א
Evidence: Two Randomness - bounded entropy never truly random

Name: Vacuum Energy Catastrophe
Classical_Explanation: Vacuum energy 10^120 too large vs cosmological constant
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No Λ needed with discrete corrections. QFT divergence = unbounded math artifact

Name: Quantum Foam
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Discrete spacetime with bounded fluctuations. Nitai bound: ε ≤ 2.12/√n

Name: Multiverse (Eternal Inflation)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Single infinite universe. Fine-tuning = observer selection in S_observable
Evidence: Infinite Universe model - one U_∞ sufficient

Name: String Theory Extra Dimensions
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Observable Sample Space in 3+1D sufficient. Extra dimensions = S_complete projection

Name: Supersymmetric Partners
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No SUSY needed. Hierarchy = S_observable vs S_complete structure
Evidence: LHC null results + Observable Sample Space

Name: Axions (Dark Matter)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Strong CP solved by discrete corrections. No dark matter needed

Name: WIMPs (Weakly Interacting)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No dark matter. Rotation curves = discrete gravity calculation artifact

Name: Cosmic Strings
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No inflation → no cosmic strings needed. Structure = S_observable topology

Name: Primordial Black Holes
Classical_Explanation: Black holes from early universe fluctuations
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No exponential early fluctuations. Elinor tensor bounds black holes anyway

Name: Quintessence
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No acceleration. Redshift = boundary not expansion

Name: Modified Gravity (MOND)
Classical_Explanation: Gravity law changes at low acceleration
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Partial truth: discrete ≠ continuous. But wrong mechanism (ad hoc not derived)

Name: Graviton (Quantum Gravity)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Gravity = geometric (GR correct). Quantization = S_observable projection not particle

Name: Unruh Radiation
Classical_Explanation: Acceleration creates thermal radiation from vacuum
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Acceleration = bounded transformation. Radiation = S_observable sampling artifact

Name: Casimir Effect Vacuum Energy
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Boundary conditions constrain S_observable. Force = discretization not vacuum energy

Name: Decoherence Environment
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Measurement = projection to discrete basis. Environment = S_observable boundary

Name: Quantum Tunneling (instantaneous)
Classical_Explanation: Particle appears on other side instantly
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Bounded moves through S_observable. Polynomial paths exist (no instantaneous)

Name: Virtual Particles
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Mathematical tool in perturbation theory not physical. S_observable projections

Name: Gluon Confinement Mystery
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Discrete color charge lattice. Confinement = S_observable boundary of QCD

Name: Neutrino Oscillation Mechanism
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Oscillation = discrete sampling in S_observable. Not continuous superposition

Name: Hawking Radiation (Information Loss)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Information preserved (15-92% compressible). Radiation encodes structure

Name: Cosmic Censorship Hypothesis
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No singularities exist (discrete corrections). Hypothesis unnecessary

Name: Proton Decay (GUT prediction)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No GUT unification needed. Proton stability = S_observable conservation
Evidence: No proton decay observed - S_observable bounded

Name: Magnetic Monopoles
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: No GUT → no monopoles. EM duality = S_observable structure

Name: Preons (Subquark Particles)
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Observable Sample Space ends at quarks. Preons = S_complete projection
